timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
double largest = largestValue(precision, scale);
double largest = Math.pow(10,precision-scale) - Math.pow(10,-scale);
timeline.author: knaufk

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
/**
* Finds the largest valid number of the given precision and range.
*/
private static double largestValue(int precision, int scale) {
StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
if (precision == scale) {
builder.append("0.");
}
for (int i = 0; i < precision; i++) {
if (scale != 0 && precision != scale && i + scale == precision) {
builder.append(".");
}
builder.append(9);
}
return Double.parseDouble(builder.toString());
}
timeline.author: knaufk
